it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.MessageHandler

  • public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    class responsable of handling all the messages received, when Game recive a new message it is passed to one of the MessageHandler methods which will manage the processing of the message
    • game: the game handled by this instance of MessageHandler
    • board: the board of the game
    • turnManager: the turn manager of the game, required by the processing of TRNEND messages
    • memoryAction: HashMap which can be used to memorize the status of an action

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      protected void handleASKACT(GameMessage message, com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject jsonMessage)
      process ASKACT messages, building the action from the message and then passing it to the moveChecker, if the action is valid it is finally applied to the real state of the game

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(GameMessage message)
        given a message, based on its opcode, call the correct routine to process that message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to process

      • handleASKACT

        protected void handleASKACT(GameMessage message,
                            com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject jsonMessage)
        process ASKACT messages, building the action from the message and then passing it to the moveChecker, if the action is valid it is finally applied to the real state of the game
        Parameters:
        message - the message containing the ASKACT payload, is taken directly from the MessageManager
        jsonMessage - the JsonObject containing the ASKACT message

      • handleASKLDRACT

        protected void handleASKLDRACT(GameMessage message,
                               com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject jsonMessage)
        process ASKLDRACT messages, appling the correct logic based on the choose of the client
        Parameters:
        message - the message containing the ASKLDRACT payload, is taken directly from the MessageManager
        jsonMessage - the JsonObject containing the ASKLDRACT message

      • handleTRNEND

        protected void handleTRNEND(GameMessage message)
        process TRNEND messages, calling the correct routines of the TurnManager instance. Turn manager will pass the lock to the next player in the turn order queue and if the condtions are satisfied the escommunication phase is handled. When the game is end, the reception of a TRNEND messag trigger the activation of the EndPhaseHandler routine to compute the final score
        Parameters:
        message - the message containing the TRNEND payload, is taken directly from the MessageManager
        jsonMessage - the JsonObject containing the TRNEND message

      • parseASKACT

        public Action parseASKACT(java.util.UUID playerID,
                          com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject jsonMessage)
        given an ASKACT message this routine perform the parsing to build the action from the JSON message recived
        Parameters:
        playerID - the player who has sent the ASKACT message
        jsonMessage - JsonObject containing the ASKACT message information
        Returns:
        the action build from the ASKACT message passed as argument
